metadata.description: Chinese internet buzzwords and slang from 2024-2025 - rapidly evolving vocabulary
sources: 国家语言资源监测与研究中心 2024年度十大网络用语
百度百科 2024年十大网络流行语
metadata.usage: Understanding modern Chinese communication, translation of informal content, social media analysis
metadata.warning: 网络流行语变化快，本词汇表需定期更新 - Internet slang changes rapidly, requires regular updates

overview.description: Modern Chinese internet vocabulary reflects current social trends and events
characteristics: Often derived from viral content, memes, or events
Mix of Chinese characters, pinyin abbreviations, and English
May be incomprehensible to older generations
overview.translation_challenge: Difficult to translate without losing cultural context; often requires explanation

official_2024_buzzwords.source: 国家语言资源监测与研究中心发布

新质生产力.meaning_zh: 创新驱动的高质量生产力
新质生产力.context: Economic policy term from government reports
新质生产力.translation_note: Official term, translate literally with context

黑神话悟空.context: Major Chinese AAA game release in 2024
黑神话悟空.translation_note: Keep original English title 'Black Myth: Wukong'

人工智能+.meaning_zh: 人工智能与各行业深度融合
人工智能+.context: Policy term for AI integration across industries

City不City.origin: 美国博主保保熊与妹妹对话
City不City.context: Used to describe modern, exciting experiences
City不City.translation_note: Cannot be translated literally; explain as 'modern/exciting'

班味儿.meaning_zh: 上班后那种疲惫、沧桑的状态和气质
班味儿.context: Describes the exhausted appearance of office workers
班味儿.example: 一看你就班味儿很重 (You look very office-worker-tired)

松弛感.meaning_zh: 从容应对、不焦虑的心理状态
松弛感.context: Popular during 2024 Paris Olympics describing Gen-Z athletes
松弛感.example: 她很有松弛感 (She has a very relaxed vibe)

含金量还在上升.pinyin: hán jīn liàng hái zài shàngshēng
含金量还在上升.meaning: The gold content is still rising
含金量还在上升.meaning_zh: 某人或某物的价值随时间逐渐显现和提升
含金量还在上升.context: Used to praise someone whose value is being recognized over time
含金量还在上升.example: 这个选择的含金量还在上升

浓人淡人.meaning_zh: 浓人精力充沛外向活跃，淡人内敛低调

主理人.meaning_zh: 负责品牌或项目运营的核心人物
主理人.context: Originally from streetwear culture, now broader usage

abbreviation_slang.description: Common online abbreviations using first letter of each character's pinyin

awsl.meaning: Oh I'm dead / So cute I could die

硬控.original_meaning: Hard crowd control (makes character unable to move)
硬控.internet_meaning: To be captivated, unable to look away
硬控.example: 这个视频硬控我三分钟 (This video captivated me for 3 minutes)

输出.internet_meaning: To express opinions intensely, to rant
输出.example: 他开始疯狂输出 (He started ranting intensely)

破防.example: 这个故事让我破防了 (This story made me cry)

上头.example: 追剧追得太上头了 (Got too obsessed watching this drama)

下头.example: 这个结局太下头了 (This ending is such a turn-off)

绝绝子.note: Popular but considered overused by some

emo.usage: 我今天有点emo (I'm feeling a bit down today)

无语.usage: 我真的无语了 (I'm truly speechless)

离谱.usage: 这也太离谱了吧 (This is too outrageous)

炸裂.usage: 这个表演太炸裂了 (This performance is mind-blowing)

打工人.usage: 打工人打工魂 (Worker's soul, worker's spirit)

内卷.meaning: Involution - excessive competition without real progress
内卷.usage: 现在太内卷了 (Things are too competitive now)

躺平.meaning: Lie flat - give up on ambition, do minimum
躺平.usage: 我决定躺平了 (I've decided to lie flat)

摆烂.meaning: Let it rot - give up completely

卷王.meaning: King of competition - someone who works excessively hard

画饼.meaning: Draw a pie - make empty promises
画饼.usage: 老板又在画饼了 (The boss is making empty promises again)

水灵灵地.internet_meaning: Vividly, freshly, in an eye-catching way
水灵灵地.usage: 水灵灵地上班 (Going to work all fresh)

遥遥领先.meaning: Far ahead / Leading by a mile
遥遥领先.context: Huawei marketing phrase that became meme

拿捏.usage: 这个造型被她拿捏了 (She nailed this look)

整活.usage: 又在整活了 (Doing something creative again)

general_rules: Provide context or explanation when necessary
Consider target audience age and familiarity with Chinese internet culture
Some terms may be better left in pinyin with explanation

strategies.formal_contexts: Avoid using slang; use standard Chinese equivalent
strategies.informal_contexts: Can use English internet slang equivalents (e.g., YYDS → GOAT)
strategies.localization: Adapt to local internet slang of target language
strategies.subtitling: May need translator notes or glossary
